review_text: Everyone was fantastic
First time there. Very impressed. Plans to come again!
The staff was excellent. It could have been a little cleaner.
Breakfast was fresh and well organized alot of options
Absolutely lovely.  We could live here.  Highly recommend this property!!
All the basics were covered well
Everyone is very friendly and the room is very clean.  I wish the pillows could be more comfortable.
Great room, friendly staff, nice breakfast!

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. The room was larger than the photos on line. The gym was one of the best I‚Äôve ever worked out for a hotel. Dumbbells go up to 75 lbs. The hotel was also dog friendly. Definitely recommend.
Room was great. The fenced yard for the dog is a plus +

Was pleasantly surprised with a very modern Hotel. The room was incredibly spacious and clean and comfortable! Loved my stay. Free breakfast in the morning was presented well, good coffee and so many options in a very well thought out space that could accommodate a lot of people.. did not feel crowded what so ever. Very nice. I can see why people would want long term stays here!

Clean room with kitchenette fully supplied with dishes and utensils and dishwasher; 24-hour coffee in lobby and great breakfast; free bottled water; helpful staff; allows pets but not disruptive of other guests; excellent location in Lewes with easy access to downtown and/or beach.
great hotel would stay again
Very clean room and property.  Relaxing by the firepit in the evening was a plus.
Front desk was very busy, but still very welcoming! Room was clean! Breakfasts were great!
No one cleaned our room for the two day stay.
Good breakfast and friendly staff.
All staff were very kind and considerate. Breakfast offered  healthy choices. Glad we chose this hotel to spend our vacation.

From the moment Jeanine greeted us and allowed us to check in early to when we checked out, we had a wonderful stay.  Our room was clean and quiet.  I was initially worried that our room overlooked what I think was the kitchen ventilation system, but we did not hear any noise from it.  While not the nicest view, we were able to check in early and get a good start on our day (you have to take what you can get when checking in a noon).  The room had a fully equipped kitchen which we made good use of.   The included breakfast was fabulous!  There were so many options and some of the best bacon I've had in a long time that was cooked to perfection.  They also had vegetarian options.  The coffee was delicious and always available and always hot.  Location is terrific if planning on going to Lewes and Rehoboth beaches. We'll definitely be staying here the next time we come to the area.

Hotel was nice, but stayed two nights and one day without any housekeeping help. Also at checkout the desk clerk was rude was speaking to daughter and having private conversation on speaker at the same checking is out and asking us questions. Actual hotel set is beautiful, stocked with needs, and breakfast was hot and ready on time.
Gym
friendly staff, great breakfast, quiet, supper clean!

Aerosol spray was everywhere and isn‚Äôt needed the pool was opaque and the same items were on the floor two days in a row. The staff were friendly and the room was clean but the sheets and blankets were polyester. I thought Hilton prides themselves on a comfy bed. There is nothing comfy about polyester.

Only two modest hiccups: Found a clump of hair floating in the pool and a cigarette butt on floor @ outdoor seating area. 
We especially enjoy this hotel. Breakfast is very good and staff is pleasant.

We enjoyed our stay here. Home2 Suites is definitely an upgrade from your standard room. It is spacious, has a large frig, dw, & kitchen area. The included breakfast was quite extensive with many choices. We would def stay here again.
Says dog friendly, then charges you a dog fee

This is the nicest place to stay ever! Everything works! I have been to hotels that advertise amenities,,,,, ultil you get there everything is not working or dirty. This place is amazing! the cleanest rooms the cleanest lobby ! The staff is very helpful ! I have already recommended this hotel to several people.
Excellent staff, easy parking, excellent breakfast buffet, comfortable bed and room

The room was not ready at 3,, so I went to Starbucks and came back an hour and 1/2 later and the room was still not ready . Then she asked if we would like to move to another room and I said is it the same and she did not know then finally she looked and said yes it's the same and I said that's fine . And then they told her that we wanted it on a different credit card and she's still charged my credit card. Then we had to wait for the hot water to get done and when I asked she said oh I had it done over 20 minutes ago
The room was clean and had everything I needed to make a small meal with a small kitchen  . The hotel was located near a lot of restaurants and shops .

It was very clean and the suite was comfortable.  Front desk was very kind and helpful. Pool was nice. Only complaint was breakfast.  Waffles tasted sour, factory scrambled eggs and some sausage shaped meat product with a strange texture.  Hard boiled eggs were good.  Bread products were ok. It was included in suite price.  I won't eat there next time but everything else was excellent.  I will definitely stay here again.
Always have a wonderful experience with staying at this hotel. Love the location, the rooms, the lobby, the breakfast, the gym, the pool, the staff and the walkability to everything!

This was one of the best Hiltons I have probably ever stayed in. The location is great, just about a 10 min drive to downtown Lewes and 15 mins to Dewey beach. 

The free breakfast was also above average with food options. I enjoyed the complimentary coffee, tea and water stations that were available 24/7. Parking was also free and ample, it's a large lot with plenty of spaces. The rooms were also very clean and the kitchenette was a nice bonus I wasn't expecting. I did not hear any road noise either.

I will definitely stay here again the next time I visit the DE beaches!
Very clean, comfortable bed, smart TV. Reasonable price. Yes, we would stay here again. Friendly staff.

Very roomy, nice kitchen area and nice sized fridge. Great breakfast and loved that they had coffee/tea etc and infused water available 24/7. Only thing we missed was an in room safe. But overall a great place to stay.
The breakfast was great. Rooms were very clean. Pizza shop across was amazing! Plenty of stores close proximity as well as restaurants. Great location.
Super convenient amenities and location. Clean and up to date. No flash. Just function.
This was a really nice hotel. The rooms were nice and the hotel was very clean. We were only about a 10 min drive from the outlets.
10/10 hotel. i saw the staff cleaning touch points in the hotel and

It was a great stay overall. Check in was very easy. Fruit infused water in the lobby was a nice touch and great hit with the family. Bottle water and coffee are free which was very welcome. The breakfast has many varieties to choose from. The room was spacious and clean. The only thing I wish different was the bed was too soft for me, but that's a personal preference. My son commented this was much better than many other hotels we've been to.
Friendly staff. Great price for the room. Very clean. Quiet.
Very nice hotel and conveniently located . Will definitely come back
We enjoyed out stay because the hotel was so clean and nice
Very family friendly!!
Our family stay was great! The staff was very welcoming,  provided us with a list of locations fornthe best seafood. We will be a repeat customer.
Large, well equipped room. Only complaint was the dog smell in the hallways. Luckily, our room still smelled new. Could they restrict the dogs to a specific area? They were all over the place.
Staff was very friendly
Very clean, provided shampoo, would go again!
It was good
Typical 3 star facility no restaurant but pizza place close by!
Very nice property.  Would stay here again.  Front desk people very friendly and helpful.

Our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 teens) stayed here for 4 days and 3 nights. The room we booked was spacious for us- beds were clean and comfy, bathroom and kitchen was clean. The room overall was clean and comfortable for us. I find the curtain partition between the beds and the sofa bed very convenient. We needed to cook our meal for our son so we had to request a hot plate/hot stove and pan from front desk. Breakfast was the usual hotel buffet breakfast, varied and a lot of choices. Loved the complimentary coffee and fruit infused water, as well as water bottles in the lobby. Overall comfortable stay for our little family getaway!
The rooms were spacious, well equipped and clean. Great value
Great hotel for the price
Love love this property, perfect location and very clean, welcoming staff. 1st time and will stay again

The breakfast area was not set up all that efficiently. Breakfast was good but everyone wants a waffle and for those that don‚Äôt‚Ä¶..it‚Äôs a hot mess. Make a separate waffle area. People are frustrating and inconsiderate of others. You  n can‚Äôt help that at all I know.
Great hotel and friendly staff. Thank you
I didn't like the fact that your prices continue to go up significantly every year.
Our room was great everything you need is in there.Very clean
I was told this is a dog friendly hotel. Why am I getting calls for my dog barking.  Terrible
Very clean and well maintained. The staff was friendly and helpful. Wonderful stay. I will definitely stay here again when in the area.
Smelled clean and looked exactly how it looked in pictures. The staff was friendly as well!

Sauber, gro√ües modernes Zimmer, (f√ºr amerikanische Verh√§ltnisse) gutes Fr√ºhst√ºck (Porzellangeschirr), mehr als genug Parkm√∂glichkeiten. Mit dem Auto schnell am Strand (Parkautomat, auch Mitte Juli noch Parkpl√§tze frei)
Always love staying here, thank you
It turn Ty the

Our room was horrible. By the elevator maintenance room and also window backed up to all the ac units in center area. Our ac unit worked terribly and was so loud. Terrible noise from elevator  room. Pillows were horrible and bed seemed like a full size. We had no sleep!

Our vacation was one for the book! We stayed at Home 2 Suites July 7th-13th it was absolutely AWESOME! Our check-in was super easy. Destiny, the Front Desk was absolutely Amazing! The entire staff was wonderful we were always greeted with a smile. If you are in the Rehoboth/Lewes Delaware area, Home 2 Suites is just the place you are looking for.
Very clean! The only complaint is the pool, very small.

Stayed a few nights with the family for easy access to the beach and boardwalk activities. The room was clean and with plenty of counter space. Kitchen had everything needed for a comfortable stay. Breakfast offered many options. Friendly and helpful staff. The only negative is that the pool can be cleaner. Would stay again in the future.
The beds had dirty sheets. Upon showing this to the front desk, we were provided with clean, and had to make our own beds. Very disappointing
Great stay!

Severe dog allergy 
Was told I would be in a room where a dog hasn‚Äôt stayed for a year or two
Trip to Urgent Care says otherwise 

Shower was not hot and had no pressure

Breakfast was gross

Asked for room to be cleaned, they never did
There was bed bugs !!! I got bit
Clean and comfortable. From the warmth of the staff upon arrival, the clean, large, bright room provided a comfortable home away from home.
By a door that slams from people coming and going and broken item in room. Room was clean and spacious.  Staff was kind and helpful.
Everything was great , check in and out cleanliness the smell .
We brought our 2 dogs with us great area to walk dogs very clean and good breakfast . Will stay there again when I am in the area .
Wonderful hotel. Please post better signs to direct drivers to entrance.
Everything was great!
Everything went well.
Clean, friendly staff and great breakfast!
Great hotel
This property was clean and convenient and within 5 minutes driving distance to the beach.
I appreciated the kind and friendly staff.
This hotel was amazing. So clean, so well managed, and the staff was so friendly
We loved this property, its cleanliness and its proximity to the beach. Overall our family had a great experience.

Staff was super friendly. We did switch rooms after a couple of days due to a hot water issue, they were great about it though! Very clean hotel, beds were comfortable, in room amenities were great for a long stay. Good location too!
Clean , friendly staff, room exceded expectations, close to everything.

Very nice and roomy hotel. I liked having kitchenette in our room with a good size fridge, dishwasher, full size microwave and a sink. Breakfast was very decent. All day long coffee and tea in the lobby. Friendly staff!

Having visited this hotel for number of years I must say that it looks new everytime. The breakfast improves.  The perks improve. The staff remains tops! The counter and storage space in the room is unbelievable.  This year the matress was a little soft for me. But even that is a preference,  not a complaint.
Large snd doavios hotel room.
Wonderful staff, very friendly and helpful. Rooms are large, clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay again when I am in this area.
Disappointed that the fire pit was not working! The shower had some black mold in the corner and some around the track! A little cloxox would take that right off! I have pictures!
Stayed here for work. The property is immaculate, the service was exceptional. the shower heads are high enough for taller people.
nice, spacious room.  Good shower, everything was clean, was a nice room to stay a while.
Clean hotel, friendly staff, nice dog area
nice staff
Price is affordable. The room has microvave, big refrigerator and kitchenwares. The room is very clean. The breakfast is plentiful in wide convenient dining area. Staff are courteous.
Very clean,personal and pleasant staff. Room was great and safe area
I love staying here. The staff is very welcoming and provides lots of information about the room and amenities.  Every thing here is spotless and designed for comfort.
Room was spacious and clean.  Very comfortable bed and pillow.  Breakfast was good and shot of variety. They had flavored water throughout the day which is s plus.
This is the best hotel we stayed in. Huge room. Great breakfast choices.  And they even have a dog park. We loved everything!!!!

Had an issue with the first room we were given but the person at front desk was very understanding and assigned us a new room which was much better. Very spacious and lots of counter space. Pool is small but nice.
Great stay. Nice lobby, good breakfast, everyone friendly, plenty of parking.
Property was clean, staff friendly
This property far exceeded my expectations.  The room size, decor and amenities were discussed with everyone we interacted with all weekend. Will definitely book there again when I am in the area.

Have been visiting Rehoboth Beach since I was 5 yrs. old....have stayed at many places.....this has been by far the best yet ! All staff members were very attentive and greeted you evetytime you came in ! Will definitely be back ! Thank you for a very enjoyable stay !
Clean, convenient locale.  Great staff.
Good
It was centrally located , near everything we needed. The staff was very helpful and accommodations clean and comfortable.
The desk staff was so helpful. I‚Äôm not familiar with the area, but they gave me great directions to my destination.
Nice, convenient place to stay.  Room was large with lots of shelves and countertop to hold our things.  Only negative was that beds are a bit broken down.
This hotel location was excellent with plenty of amenities to choose from.

I still gave this hotel an ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù because the only thing I did not care for was the breakfast. But the amenities, cleanliness, convenience, and rooms are impeccable! I could stay here for a month and be happy!

Great beach town!
There for only one night but hotel was clean and staff was friendly
The front desk and breakfast staff were friendly and helpful.  Loved the fire pit.
Pillows could have been  nicer.
Loved the room. The staff was terrific.
Excellent
Clean, convenient, pet friendly, breakfast options were great.
nice. check in was fast, hotel was clean and nice. everything was perfect.
This was my second stay and once again the staff and the stay was amazing

The property was clean and welcoming. Our room was just what we needed. spacious, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good, a lot of choices and the staff were very good. Would stay again and recommend to others.

Absolutely everything about this hotel was exceptional. Clean, amazing staff great amenities the breakfast spread was insane. 
Great job
Excellent
Great property in a great location. Clean and friendly.
Very nice and clean.
Lovely stay!
This was my first time staying at Home 2. The lobby area really impressed me. After we got back from dinner, we just hung out in the lobby area because it was so comfortable.
The separate bedroom and size of the suite made it a comfortable stay when extended family visited.

One of the best hotel stays I have ever had. Clean facilities with unmatched comfort choices, from their free water selection to the lobby market that even had quality treat options for both cats and dogs, they truly make you feel at home. The only thing that can outshine the phenomenal breakfast bar is the unparalleled customer service. Effortlessly efficient without ever compromising quality, from the housekeeping and maintenance staff to front desk. I can‚Äôt imagine staying anywhere else now.
Good job!

Very clean. Love the big, free breakfast and the coffee and hot chocolate bars that are available all day. Nice, warm pool and I could do my Peloton bike exercises there with their Peloton bike. Rooms are spacious and clean. We always stay there for our Delaware beaches vacations.

We were in DE to view properties and brought our dogs with us. I picked this dog friendly hotel not knowing anything about it - well, it was a GREAT choice because of the effort made to accommodate dogs, from a gift on arrival to the places available to walk them and even a small fenced area where they could be off leash. I really appreciated this because our pups are our family, as is the case with so many pet owners. Our room was very clean as was the hotel as a whole. Customer care was very good. We will be staying again when the need arises. Thank you!
You can only lower the temp to 68 which is far too warm for comfortable sleeping for many people, like me, so tossed and turned all night. üò¢. I doubt I‚Äôll stay again for that reason.

Excellent customer service.Room clean and bed so comfy! Great breakfast and lobby had coffee, tea, bottled and infused waters plus mints all complementary
 Pool was nice. Would highly recommend a stay here.

Very nice hotel! Fruit infused water, coffee, tea and hot chocolate available 24/7.  Breakfast had many options and I was impressed that they offered gluten free items for my daughter who has celiac disease.  Staff was friendly and very willing to help with anything we needed.  We had a handicapped room for my Mom and it was extremely spacious.  My only complaint (which staff can‚Äôt do anything about) is that whomever designed the building, put the handicapped rooms farthest away from the elevator. It was difficult for my Mom to walk that far, even with her rollator.  Maybe hotel should have a wheelchair guests could use while in hotel.
Beds were comfortable, pillows could be better.  Convenient location. This our 2nd stay here and will definitely stay again.
Good breakfast included, 24/7 coffe, hot tea, hot chocolate, and flavored water
Great all around will stay again

I was there for a soccer tournament. I originally stayed one night in another hotel with a similar price but I it was so dirty I couldn‚Äôt finish my stay there. I booked the 2nd night of my stay here and I picked this hotel because the reviews were very good and cleanliness was included. It did not fail. Immediately upon entering you could see the hotel was clean, it smelled clean, looked clean and was bright. They offered complimentary waters and chocolates upon arrival as well as a complimentary coffee/tea/hot chocolate bar available 24 hours which was much needed after being out in the cold watching sports all day. Our room was labeled a atudio but was rather large and included a full size fridge, dishwasher, microwave, utensils and cups/ plates. The room was very clean and comfortable as well. The breakfast included eggs, waffles, cereals, breads and pastries and the eating area was very clean. It turned my weekend around from terrible to wonderful.

First time staying here but not the last !!!!!
Staff are so friendly and welcoming
This my second time staying at this hotel and it‚Äôs was great and quiet just what I needed.
Staff had great attitudes
I really enjoyed my stay last night. Looking forward to staying again in the future.
Perfect for what we needed. A layover with our dog. The room was clean and did not smell ! Perfect
Terrible customer service. From not answering the phone to hanging up after being put on hold‚Ä¶.
Snow removal from parking lot was awful. AC/Heating units in rooms were very noisy and not insulated well.
This a must hotel to stay in Lewes! Lots of space, clean and good location. Breakfast etc was great.
Wonderful stay from the time we stopped at the registration desk until we left the hotel
Limited breakfast options compared to other Home2 suites. Price was right. Place was overall clean.
Enjoyed our 1 night stay! Clean and modern rooms. Our small dog enjoyed the pet playground. We enjoyed the fire pit.
Great Staff and service!
N a
Nice hotel
Amazingly clean and the staff was great! Cleatis checked us in and was INCREDIBLE!
I really enjoyed the stay. The staff was very friendly.
Breakfast was good many choices and very clean

The room was large and comfortable.  There was a problem with the dispensers on the bathroom wall.  One dispenser was sitting on a shelf since the wall holder was broken.  Another dispenser had a faulty pump.
Great location
Love it ! Main desk was amazing super friendly and attentive I have a son with autism we felt so welcome
Great amenities and large rooms with kitchens.  We‚Äôll stay again.
Amazing stay.  Cletis and the rest of the staff was amazing.  Freshly baked cookies were a wonderful touch!
Excellen
Our stay at the Home 2 suites was amazing as usual. Great customer service, family, friendly very clean and accommodating and we had so much fun. Your staff is amazing.

We love this hotel! Third time staying in 4 years(the other year we didn't come to Delaware, so it's not that we stayed somewhere else). 
The facility is always clean and neat, the included breakfast is extensive, the gym has well maintained equipment, and the location is easy access. 

We actually liked this Home2 so much we now look to see if it's in other areas we are traveling to
Very clean and smells great.
Always the most amazing experience when staying here. Will not stay anywhere else in this area.
I love this place. It‚Äôs clean, quiet and convenient to all things I need!
Friendly staff, clean rooms and hotel, great breakfast selection, free bottled water and cookies. Suites were well equipped.

Overall, it was a very clean hotel. The shower stall could use some minor buffing up but then again that‚Äôs coming from a neat freak like me. The room was spacious & had everything a family would need. Staff is very friendly & attentive.
This was our first trip with our 1 year old boxer puppy . The staff was amazing , the dog park was so great . Very clean always smelled good and the breakfast was top notch . We will be coming back !
I always stay at the same places by Hilton when I travel. This is a new property. And, I must say, It‚Äôs my #1 pick for a peaceful stay.
Spacious clean and quiet
Clean and welcoming
Perfect site for a fall weekend
Everything was really great. Very clean and awesome breakfast selection. Friendly staff.  The beds though are very hard. Not comfortable sleeping.
Super friendly staff, clean property, comfortable spacious rooms.
Nothing to share

I rented one of the largest suites for 3 people through Expedia.  All 3 of us came home with BEDBUG BITES on our body. I have tried most unsuccessfully to get an intelligent person on Expedia or at Hilton to address our concerns.  The trash towels and sheets were not changed when we were there.  We did not get clean towels until 5:00 pm on the 2nd day.  We had to leave the dirty towels in the hallway as well as the trash which they asked we keep in the suite.  Obviously, both beds, the linens, and the pull-out sofa had bedbugs.  Our bites were on the arm, elbow, bottom of the face, and stomach on all 3.  This is ridiculous for an alleged 4 yr old property let alone not being able to get attention to this matter at Expedia or the hotel.  The hotel keeps you on hold forever and I have hung up after 10 minutes.
Modern and well-appointed, a nice spacious suite.  Would recommend!
I really like this hotel.  The breakfast was a lot better than other hotels that i stayed at as well.
Liked room size, clean. Overall, you have dishes and dishwasher which is convenient
Well maintained property‚Ä¶excellent customer service!
Excellent experience

Just perfect for my wife, daughter and doggie. Staff was outstanding.

Great dog park and fire pit.
excellent value, nice outdoor spaces including a gas fire pit and dog park.
This was a dog friendly hotel that was very clean and modern.  I would definitely return.  Beautiful and friendly staff.
Bathroom ceiling was peeling from water leak
Loved the attached dog park!

Great property for people traveling with pets. easily accessible dog park just outside. Nice outdoor seating area with firepit nearby. Very clean and quiet even with multiple pets on site. Very accommodating, knowledgeable staff. large common areas with multiple cozy seating arrangements for families, seniors with pets to socialize. Incredible breakfast buffet with options to suit every age and dietary preferences.
Facility and staff are fantastic.
If you a dog‚Ä¶ best hotel
Noticed the carpet had stains.
Good place to stay on Rt 1 while being back from the road - very quiet. Closest to Lewes and really close to Lewes bike trail. Rehoboth close enough though traffic could be challenging.
The staff was so nice and the rooms were so clean.
E-checkin and out was very easy

Our first impression when we arrived that afternoon was of the guy at the front desk. Very personable, energetic and gave us what turned out to be a fantastic restaurant suggestion. Our rooms were very nice and having an actual freezer was a nice bonus. My only complaints are small, but I'm mentioning anyway. The matress was too hard for my liking. I noticed a bit of pink slime mold in the shower corners and in the shower door track. Again, it was a small amount, but still grossed me out. Mom was psyched to see the walk-in shower, but I slipped a bit in mine and she felt there weren't enough grab bars for her to shower safely. And lastly, my toilet seat was mounted crooked onto the toilet. It was a bit uncomfortable and unnerving. Other than that it was a great place to stay. We're already looking for things to do down there so we can cone back.
just stayed one night and it could not have been better
Exceeding my expectations; breakfast variety was great! The unlimited access to hot water, hot choc, coffee, drinks, was a very nice perk.

I stayed for a week and was extremely pleased with the entire experience. I saw that they allowed dogs and was worried that it might have that "dog smell" but there was nothing but a pleasant, clean smell everywhere. The bed was comfortable, the amenities were great and every staff member that I interacted with was friendly and helpful. There was complimentary tea and coffee in the lobby as well as my favorite, infused water. I enjoyed the free breakfast in the lobby each morning. It was always fully stocked and offered fresh fruit and a good selection of other breakfast items.
We wished we plan a longer stay. Hotel is very modern, clean and comfortable bed. The breakfast has large variety of foods to choose from. Good jobs!
Dog was allowed to run wild in lobby
Quiet but close enough to drive to the beach.
The staff were very nice and professional. The hotel was clean, convenient to lots of places including restaurants and stores.
Amazing customer service, clean rooms. Best hotel super close to beach.
The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly. The breakfast was good lots of options. It only took a few minutes to get to cape henlopen beach. Will definitely be staying there again.
Great property
We have spent a number of weeks at the hotel. We love it there.
Extraordinary staff. Very accommodating and friendly. Great shopping location next to giant pizza restaurant and outlets. Far from beach, close to restaurants.
We had a wonderful stay! The staff is super friendly and the rooms were clean and comfortable.

Hotel was filled with little "extra" touches that I found really nice - fruit infused waters, coffee and decaf, cookies and bottled water 24/7; SUPER clean and staff very knowledgeable and friendly. I loved our King suite - slept like a baby all three nights - also LOVED the blackout shade!  Would stay here again in a heart beat!  Thanks!
We felt right at home. Great place to stay with the family. Very welcoming. Good breakfast. Lovely pool. Fantastic service. Close to attractions by car. Near bus to Rehoboth Boardwalk.

I absolutely love this property. First of all, the front desk staff the night we checked in was amazing, it was towards the end of his shift but he didn‚Äôt mind helping us out. 

The location was convenient, pizza place was walking distance, gasoline station, Japanese restaurant and it‚Äôs so accessible to the main coastal hiway to shops, the beach and restaurants. But you won‚Äôt hear anything at night, so quiet. 

The hotel itself is amazingly clean, rooms are clean, spacious and updated. Coffee, juice, hot water/tea/ hot chocolate area were always attended to and refilled. There were free snacks. water and for pets too (snacks and water for dogs). The breakfast was really good as well. I will definitely stay here on our next visit. Didn‚Äôt mind the room
Rate during our visit, it was well worthit. Thank you and keep it up!
We've stayed at this Home 2 Suites twice now and have great experiences there. It's convenient to Lewes, well maintained and staffed, with a large breakfast.
Stay was "ok". Location was on a main highway, but far enough off that it was quiet. Breakfast included, but egg-related items were rather bland.

We stayed in a 2 bedroom (2 queens) and pull out sofa suite with kitchen facilities.  We were particularly impressed with the housekeeping team for our floor.  The main desk concierges were so helpful, too.    And, the amazing  breakfast crew kept up with everyone coming and going!    Even the crew assigned to pick up anything left behind in the dog park by negligent dog owners were diligent.
Clean, amenities and breakfast provided
It was pet friendly,and in a nice environment
Loved the pool, infused water and dining area
Nice and clean, good breakfast.

Stay was excellent. Our service desk representative was very informative .Literature is available for places to visit. Great selection of breakfast items. Room has mini kitchen with full size refrigerator,  microwave dishwasher, dishes, with coffee maker. Location is close to everything. I recommend especially with small children.
Sitting around the fire and the welcome gifts
Excelentes instalaciones y muy completo. A un precio justo
Perfect for what we needed
Everything was perfect! Everything
All was excellent
The cleanest hotel we've ever stayed at.... the breakfast was great, the employees were so kind, and the local was perfect!
We had a great experience at the hotel.  The hotel staff and cleaning crew were great!
Everything was good , just that $1,200 for just 4 days is expensive
They gave us the wrong room and pulled out way more money then needed for our stay

The staff was friendly but not always at the front desk. Enjoyed the salt water indoor pool. Bathroom clean and shower had good pressure. The bathroom door was a sliding door that was hard to lock. The air conditioner shut off and went on throughout the night waking us up.
Very nice and comfortable.

The hotel had a lottle wear and tear, also the pool was oily and room too hot, but we enjoyed our stay. The room was spacious and clean enough, the lobby was comfy, breakfast could have been better. Overall 4 out of five if i had to rate it.
enjoyed our stay!
Great stay! Clean room. Friendly staff.

The hotel was clean. Location is great. Cletis at the front desk made the best infused water. However, I was there for FOUR days and barely received any room service. Towels were swapped out but the bathroom was not cleaned and the beds were not made. Just very disappointing to not have basic room service done during a FOUR day stay.
Great Hotel.
This property had great staff!
Room was very clean and inviting. The staff was friendly and answered any questions we had. Breakfast is available, but having eggs, bacon and sausage seperate would be nice!
This is the best hotels all around
Pool needs ventilation and hours for adult swim only. To noisy when children are present.
Lot of amenities. Very large room and super fresh
Super place to stay. Clean, friendly & helpful staff. Infused water every day.
Loved the shared areas on the first level. Very clean rooms.
This is a really well-maintained, comfortable and convenient hotel.  Large rooms, comfortable beds, nice bathrooms, etc.  Breakfasts offerings are well above average.
The front desk staff was very friendly and extremely helpful!

The hotel was very nice. But actually finding it was very difficult. It doesn‚Äôt face a street and just sort of sits in the middle of a parking lot that is poorly marked and has a confusing layout. The signage for the hotel is on a marquee with several stores and restaurants. Not immediately recognizable and hard to spot while driving. There needs to be a serious re-design of the parking and a dedicated approach needs to be laid out. Lots of families and groups staying there. That is to be expected due to the proximity to a beachside resort town. Just a little noisy in the hallways in the evening and at night, also in the early morning. The breakfast was fine, just a little bit on disarray after unsupervised children made a mess of the set up. The staff was friendly and accommodating.

I want to say a big thank you to the supervisor of house keeping Niki. Front desk was not friendly. Nike has excellent customer service and should be promoted. The front desk should ve fully trained ok how to accommodate their customers
Wonderful all around!
Clean, safe & spacious room. Comfortable areas to sit outside by fire pit and enjoy a cocktail. Wonderful breakfast each morning.
Very convenient, clean, safe, quiet

Clean, quite, staff professional and courteous.
Location was strange but doable.
Really nice property. Good staff.  Good breakfast
Nice
The staff is so helpful and friendly. This hotel has everything you need: a kitchen in the room, free coffee, breakfast, and a dog park in the back. Love the location-10 minutes from the beach.
This property really exceeded our expectations. Everything was wonderful from the amenities to the staff. Our family of six would definitely stay here again.
Perfect stay
Loved it. Love the heated pool
Nice front desk staff, very quiet and comfortable room
Excellent people work there!
What‚Äôs not to like?
Nice room comfy beds
Staff was friendly, especially the front desk. They were very helpful. This hotel is very pet friendly and they have a nice area for dogs to run.
It was perfect for my business trip.  The room was clean and aloud me to spread out.
Great stay. Love the location and low price.

We had a wonderful time , very quiet family hotel. 
Room were big and clean. Would stay here again.

What a perfect experience!! My husband and I were so honestly impressed with the staff and experience equally. Cletos at the desk is absolutely without a doubt hospitality!! He was so kind and guest satisfaction was his goal in such a kind manner!! He is an asset!!
Thank you for a wonderful experience
The hotel is very accommodating for dogs. The place usl
It was spacious, clean and the staff was friendly.
Very nice rooms. Convenient to all attractions n family in the area.

You get a lot included with this hotel.  A decent breakfast every day, free coffee, cookies, mints, hot chocolate, tea all day every day.  Gas grills at your disposal, outdoor fire pits lit at night, a heated indoor pool.  The rate in the off-season is amazing for what you get.

The things that might turn some people off, but didn't bother me, are that they only clean the rooms every other day, and that it's a short drive to the downtown beach and boardwalk area.  I'd imagine that during the summer it must be pretty hard to find parking down there, so staying at a hotel that's a short walk to the beach might make more sense for a lot of people.

This is a fairly new property in the heart of Lewes DE and very convenient to shopping and dining.  The guy at the front desk (Cletus) very friendly and welcoming.  Love the free water and cookies for Hilton Honers members. The hotel was clean, great amenities including a salt water pool and exercise room. Beds were very comfy and the room had great space with fridge, full size microwave and even a dishwasher!
My only complaint was the inattentive parents who congregated downstairs while their kids ran the halls and up and down the steps. The baseball teams stayed there, but that's no fault of the hotel.
I would definitely stay here again.
Nice hotel with good location.
Dog courtyard
Perfect for family vacation
Clean well maintained and extremely pleasant accommodating staff!
From the moment we walked in until we left the staff was friendly. The room was very nice and convenient.

Front desk staff on Saturday evening were rude, dismissive, and accepted no responsibility or solution to my problem. There was ZERO internet. While my WiFi was logged into the Hilton Honors WiFi, there was no Internet. The moment I stepped outside to the parking lot, it worked, but not within the hotel. The Front Desk member was not helpful and arrogant and didn't seem to care about my issue nor offer any suggestions.

The other two significant issues... we were given a handicap room with a shower that leaked all over the bathroom and the kitchen. It wasn't worth it to switch, but we weren't able to take showers.

Finally, while the key worked for our door, the door handle was jammed and wouldn't open. Took a lot of back and forth with the hotel.
Super clean, pretty new, friendly staff, nice breakfast and snacks on hand no charge.
Pet friendly. Needed to travel with cat, and that was no problem.

My room was quiet, roomy and clean. The bed was very comfortable and I was easily able to secure additional pillows as I needed to relax and sleep in an upright sitting position. The breakfast offering was sufficient and the snacks were nice unexpected perks.  The young man at the front desk was very personal and accommodating.  He made our stay pleasant from the moment we arrived.
Friendly check in, hot coffee and tea always available. Very nice room with kitchen tools, dishes, utensils, glasses, microwave. Comfy and quiet.
Very friendly staff nice hotel
Very nice hotel an very reasonable cost
Amazing place to stay. Very cozy and comfortable. Staff was great! I would definitely stay again very soon.

Room was very clean. Front desk staff were exceptionally nice. Breakfast was ok. Lobby was almost always full with guests , even had a large birthday party in the lobby. Pool looked like it needed a good cleaning. We arrived after dark and the entrance off the road could have been marked more clearly. Bed was hard and the sofa was uncomfortable to sit on while watching TV. 
Overall it was a great stay for the price.
Very clean excellent breakfast friendly staff

Hotel is becoming a bit dated and the service has gone down substantially.  It seemed like they were struggling to get revenue and so actually charged to check in an hour and a half early despite the room being ready at the slow time of year  in the middle of winter at the beach.  Pets are welcome but the walls are thin and you can hear dogs barking late into the night.  Feels like the whole place could use a good deep cleaning.  Breakfast selections were decent, but could use more healthy options.
Hotel was so clean, beds very comfortable. Staff was so nice. Definitely will stay again when visiting.
You can put up with dogs barking constantly in the adjoining room than this is the place for you.

Very clean, great breakfast
!
Great stay
Everything about this property was amazing. Hilton just also do it for me.
Love this hotel. It‚Äôs modern and clean. Beds are so comfortable. But the best part is the staff. They are all so friendly and accommodating. I‚Äôll be back for sure!

The hotel was phenomenal. Everything was clean and the staff was friendly. The breakfast they served was of good quality and there were good options. Even though I didn‚Äôt have a pet of my own, I appreciated that it was also pet friendly. I would come back here for sure!
Was highly impressed by this hotel. Wonderful breakfast, very clean, very spacious rooms, good pricing, and even a fenced area for our dogs to run around! 10/10!
Very comfortable. Quiet rooms
They staff is always friend and helpful when I stay here.  I stay at this hotel about 6 times a year.  The hotel is very clean and rooms are comfortable.
Everything was perfect for a relaxing vacation. Beautiful outside fire pit, awesome customer service and comfortable/clean room.
Very clean and pet friendly.

I stay at this hotel every time I come to Rehoboth Beach.  The employees are very friendly and helpful.  The hotel is very clean and so quit.   Breakfast is amazing and they make fresh breakfast sandwiches all the time.  Food is amazing.
We enjoyed our stay. The room was immaculate and the bed comfortable.  We would definitely stay here again.
Would not stay anywhere else.. 2 nd time staying here.. cleanliness, convenience and amenities are superior . Staff is exceptional!!

Great place to stay without breaking the bank. I chose the Peleton room ( bike in the room!). Wasn‚Äô happy to be on the first floor, but it wasn‚Äôt noisy - except for occasional barking dogs. Free breakfast.
Excellent
El hotel se observa nuevo y tiene unas modernas facilidades. Ofrece un desayuno completo, agua, bebidas calientes y fr√≠as gratis. Tiene una buena ubicaci√≥n entrando a la ciudad de Lewes.
Great stay near lots of amenities
Great stay
Only one night but it was a good night. Comfortable and cozy room, very relaxed, good sleep great breakfast, can‚Äôt say enough and can‚Äôt wait to stay at a Home 2 Suite again.
Service at reception is very poor.  frequently there is no desk clerk, and you have to go searching for one.
The property was clean and easy to find.
I loved this hotel cant wait to come back again!

This is the third one of these Home2 Suites we've stayed in and it continues to impress. The overall DESIGN of the suites is so intelligent and comprehensive in terms of lodging needs and ease of movement. Really excellent! Super clean and great mattress. There are a few little things that might be improved, i.e. have a vegetarian breakfast sandwich (aside from the veggie omelet, which we appreciated), and use the same ceramic mugs that are in the suites at the breakfast area.
Great pet friendly hotel.
Very clean. Nice breakfast. Very comfortable.
The hotel was very clean and very friendly staff. We will definitely stay there again.
Nice and knowledgeable employees
Great breakfast and clean spacious rooms. Would stay there again.
Stayed 9 days with our dog, did laundry twice, hotel very clean & comfortable, love having our own kitchenette for a long visit.
Hotel was very clean, room was quite spacious, we really liked the standing shower with the complimentary body wash. We would definitely stay at this location again.

Probably 5th or 6th time we‚Äôve stayed. 
Always clean and comfortable
Loved this hotel. So clean, breakfast awesome, and the staff was amazing. Will look for Homes2 Suites wherever I travel in the future.
The hotel was very clean in all areas. The room was spacious and immaculately cleaned. Everything worked ......no complaints. The breakfast was good and arranged with sanitation in mind.
The breakfast was great - lots of choices!  There are so many great common spaces to sit and talk - we loved the outdoor patio area with fireplace.
Room was not available  until almost 5 pm lady at counter very rude about the situation

1 nacht verbleven op doorreis naar Norfolk. Prima hotel, supervriendelijke onthaalmedewerker, gratis fruit en cookies aan de receptie, goede parkeermogelijkheden, dicht bij Rehoboth Beach en de Tanger Outlets!
Wonderful dog-friendly place to stay. Very clean, nice breakfast and lobby, kitchenette.  We will be back.
Bed bugs!!!! What else needs to be said?
Lovely large room with great amenities and breakfast.

Beautiful room. Great shower head. Comfortable bed. Conveniently located close to where I had personal business to take care of. I didn't eat the breakfast because hubby said it wasn't at all great. So, I have to give up on these places that advertise free breakfast. I mean, it's a good idea to have it available; but it's bothersome that there is a price built in for something that is not very good to eat.
Best place I have stayed at in a long time. Modern, well appointed, clean, friendly staff and fellow guests. Great location. Fairly priced. Will be back.
Our stay was very nice. The only concern we had is that you can not adjust the room temperature. Both my husband and I like to sleep in a cooler room than the setting that was allowed in the room.
No complaints service was good room was goodüòä

The air conditioner in our room had a tough time cooling the room below 72 degrees fahrenheit. ... probably not a big deal for many people... but I prefer to sleep in a room around 68. Aside from that minor quibble, the staff was good. The facility and rooms were clean. The 'per friendly' environment was great for us and our Golden Retriever. The included breakfast was REALLY good! (Belgian waffles, breakfast sandwiches, and omelets on a 'continental' breakfast were very nice to see!) The location was convenient for getting to and from the Lewes and Rehoboth beach areas... although a car ride to both was necessary. (... and, in the last week of August, the traffic wasn't bad!)

I usually love to stay at this property. One of the main reasons is the pool, where I swim daily. This time the pool was unexpectedly not being heated the whole week of my stay, and the water temperature was too cold to swim. I asked about this in the middle of my stay and was told that they were waiting for a part for the heater. I suppose that can't be helped, but it was disappointing nonetheless.
We were only in Lewes, DE for the night, but the hotel was perfect, the room was beautiful and the staff was amazing.  We would definitely stay here again the next time we visit.
This was a great place to stay. The site was clean and very accommodating. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Thank you. I will definitely book again.
Really enjoyed our stay , my only complaint was because of the pets allowance and children tended to be a bit noisy at times, however would stay there again and would recommend it
No housekeeping service.
Beds are not comfortable but enjoyed the stay.
I was there for a lax tournament. The facilities are clean and friendly staff. Nice open room for my daughter and I. Grocery store across the street. Restaurants all around.

The property is not on the main highway but it‚Äôs convenient to the beach. The property was clean and full of great amenities like 24 hour gym and laundry access. Coffee, tea, fruit infused water and cookies and fruit were also complimentary 24 hours. The breakfast was free and really good. I will definitely stay here again. The room was spacious and clean. It has only 3 floors which is great for ppl who don‚Äôt like crowds or busy overcrowded hotels.
Great stay for a quick getaway!

We enjoyed our stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We was able to use the grill while kids played in the pool. I enjoyed the stay. The hotel was clean and housekeepers were friendly as well. Breakfast was good but had a lot of complications with the waffle dispenser. The waffle mix was either watery or extremely thick. But overall my family vacation stay was great and would definitely recommend to others.

I liked the cleanliness of the facility, the amenities such as, breakfast, 24 hr coffee, free water, exercise room and pool, in addition to the many comfortable areas to lounge inside and outside the hotel with a fire place and a fire pit and outdoor grills, which several families used during the 4th of July stay. The staff were always attentive and friendly.

Nice staff, very clean. Good breakfast, coffee was great. Room spacious and plenty of towels! The only silly issue is it is difficult to find the entrance from the highway because of the terrible signage among the dozen other businesses in the area!
Nos fue muy bien el hotel lleno todas mis expectativas, excelente.

The room was great and the kids enjoyed the pool. I liked the fruit infused water. The two things I wasn't thrilled about was the dirty stained carpet in our room and the over chlorinated pool. But the hotel was one of the better ones I've stayed in so far.
Hotel was very good, service was great but the only problem was that the rooms and suites need new bed pillows .
Love coming here with our dog. Everyone is friendly and always something to do with him. Plenty to do for the two of us also.  Great food, great beaches. Beautiful area
Staff were great, property was very well maintained.

Awesome hotel, great free breakfast, very good coffee. Fitness room is clean and well equipped. Staff is friendly and attentive. Rooms are also very clean and comfortable. The only drawback is that they have MSNBC on the lobby television. I would definitely stay there again.
Shower was difficult to regulate. Hot to cold.  Water pressure was low. Soaps were hard to use.  I don't how a child could take a shower.

Everything you need for a short term stay was provided. We were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the amenities: grill, fire pit, saltwater pool, plenty of lobby area seating, beverages, nice breakfast. Very nice experience. Slightly hard to locate by GPS, but once you get the lay of the land it is very central to beaches and parks. Would definitely stay again and recommend to others.

Great property, easy walk to Nicobola Pizza.  Room was huge with mid size fridge, full size microwave and even a dishwasher.  The only issue we had, which apparently could not be resolved, was the TV volume and the remote on/off.  TV had to be turned on and off manually and the volume was set so low even on max volume we could barely hear some TV stations. That was not good.  They also said they were crediting my bill $50 for the TV issue but that has yet to happen.
Excellent room and excellent stay, great service and amenities
The staff members that checked me in were nice and friendly. The hotel was clean and had great amenities.
Great place to stay - room has everything you need for a short or long stay. The facilities are great with a swimming pool and gym. Excellent free breakfast in the morning is a plus.
Hard to find on GPS.

A wonderful hotel. Super friendly staff. Large rooms with plenty of storage options, very comfortable beds, and very clean.  We loved our stay and having easy access to all that Lewes has to offer.  We would not hesitate to stay here again.
Nice employees clean comfortable room
Well thought out rooms.
My family (including fur babies) have stayed at this hotel many times and we have always been pleased. This is our favorite hotel in the area.
Very clean and wonderful service
Very clean ,a lot food and coffee and tea, staff friendly.
Awesome Stay

It was very clean. Loved the kitchenette. Staff were very helpful and pleasant. Couch in our room looked like it could be replaced. Personally the mattress was a bit too soft. Breakfast was good lots of options.
Very clean and nice atmosphere. Very good breakfast
We had an amazing stay.Your staff is wonderful,so friendly and pleasant. My ONLY complaint is better pillows. Love your dog friendly policy. We will definitely be back with our fur baby.
Convenient to Lewes, can walk to restaurants

I am not sure how new the Home2 Hilton concept is, but this was the first time I had stayed at one of these properties. I think that they have gotten a lot of things right. It‚Äôs a good place for both business and casual travelers. Families and pets are welcome and well served.
Very nice place, nice room and service. Will be staying here again. Would highly recommend.

This is a lovely and modern hotel that has contemporary rooms with comfortable beds. The rooms were clean and plenty of towels!  The breakfast was adequate for hotel standards.  I would highly recommend this hotel for comfort, safety and convenience!
Friendly staff. Great facilities.  Access to complimentary beverages and snacks 24 hours.  Very spacious rooms.  Comfy beds.  Really great facilities.
Very clean. Nice breakfast
Very clean and friendly staff
More than I expected,  the size and comfort of the room. Enjoyed the breakfast.

The area itself is fine, it is not a "quaint" part of Lewes if that is what you are after. It is in the middle of business commercial shopping, restaurant and retail. The entrance is not quickly recognizable, yet very convenient to Rte 1and Rte 9 on the outskirts of the town. 
Well lit and busy area though I could not hear a thing from my room overlooking the parking lot and adjacent to Nicolas Pizza (which is a plus for good family food). Traveling alone, I stayed for the convenience. The building itself I found to be well maintained, my room (studio set-up with kitchenette) was spotless and stocked to the rafters with towels and washcloths which I found to be a bit funny.
 My only complaint would be that my bed was adequate but not the most comfortable. 
Breakfast was ok with the usual pre-prepared fare eggs, waffles fruit and good coffee. I passed on the food though, because negotiating around other guests with kids was a  challenge and one gentleman (no doubt the alpha provider) cleaned out the fruit bowl and baked goods preparing for a zombie apocalypse with all he could carry from the buffet...gotta love people. Plenty of options nearby if you need to shop around. One caveat, the place is popular with dog owners.

The room was spacious, clean and full of amenities.  The breakfast offered was wonderful, the seating terrific and the woman overseeing it all was terrific and very helpful.  We had our dog with us, and the area outside for her was great.
The gentleman at the front desk was very good at his job. Room was spacious and clean. Decent location. Very clean. Solid breakfast. Would definitely stay again.
Very clean and comfortable hotel!

Building, breakfast, and pool all great.  Little extras like all day coffee, tea, boxed water were a pleasing perk.   Would have liked garbages in room emptied and dish washer soap and toilet paper restocked during the day.  Would stay again.
This place was beautiful

Like the concept of the suite with small kitchen. 
Did not like some of the rude guests
Feeling of being at home was created in spacious room and decor.
The facility was great very friendly and pet friendly also
Nice room
Great hotel at a reasonable price!

The location was perfect. The room was spacious & clean. Breakfast included was convenient. Complimentary drinks & snacks was a super nice touch. We were with a large family event (6 rooms) & we were able to congregate easily together in the lobby !!!
Great place, new rooms and very clean
Best place I have ever stayed.
Good with the only issue being it‚Äôs parking lot is not readily apparent
Cozy, comfy and clean!
My 1st stay. It was very welcoming and clean. Staff was pleasant and professional.

The outside patio with fire pit table was lovely. 
The breakfast could be better. Not many fresh choices. 
Good tea and coffee bar. 
Liked the free cookies
Rooms were large. Mattresses could be more comfortable, a bit hard.

We enjoy staying at the Home2. This was our 2nd visit and we have a 3rd planned. Great place with pleasant staff. Beautiful indoor pool and breakfast bar with a wide range of choices. The only downside is there is rarely hot water for showers. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the eco friendly factor and subsequent lower temps or just an inadequate hot water system.
They used ceramic dishes and stainless steel utensils to serve breakfast. I am glad they did not use paper plates etc. the breakfast was delicious with good variety.

basically hotel was fine.  My one issue was the bed.  Definitely NOT a queen size bed as requested.  was slightly larger than a full but definitely not a queen.  Please do not advertise as a queen when not(i have a queen at home and this was much smaller
